meanings.definition: A narrow passage for water to flow through.
meanings.sent1: The small stream rushed through the chutes in the rocks.
meanings.sent2: The kayaker navigated the chutes with skill and precision.
meanings.sent3: The ducks enjoyed swimming through the chutes in the pond.
meanings.sent4: The chutes of the irrigation system directed water to the crops efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The chutes in the water park made the ride thrilling and fast.

meanings.definition: A steep slope or incline used for skiing or snowboarding.
meanings.sent1: The skiers raced down the chutes on the mountain.
meanings.sent2: The snowboarder tackled the challenging chutes with confidence.
meanings.sent3: The penguins pretended to ski down the icy chutes in the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The chutes on the hill provided an exhilarating descent for the athletes.
meanings.sent5: The chutes on the ski resort were perfect for adventurous visitors.

meanings.definition: A mechanism for guiding objects or materials in a specific direction.
meanings.sent1: The factory used chutes to transport the packages to different floors.
meanings.sent2: The laundry chute made it easy to drop clothes down to the basement.
meanings.sent3: The playful cat loved to hide toys in the chute and watch them slide down.
meanings.sent4: The mailroom had a chute to send letters directly to the sorting area.
meanings.sent5: The recycling chute helped separate paper and plastic for recycling.
